Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Imran Khan read the coronavirus chart upside down and erroneously declared the curve is flattening.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the mistake made by Imran Khan by stating that he declared the curve is flattening when he actually read the chart upside down.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a satirical article published by a Pakistani news website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Imran Khan's mistake was intentional or reflects his lack of knowledge, which may not be accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Imran Khan simply made a mistake while reading the chart and it was not intentional or indicative of his knowledge on the subject.
